boardgame.name: Das Allerbeste Baumhaus
Best Treehouse Ever
Domek na drzewie
Будиночок на дереві
boardgame.description: Who hasn't dreamed of building the best treehouse in the world? Now it's time to live that dream!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Best Treehouse Ever, players compete to build their best treehouse, outfitting their treehouse with cool rooms, while also making sure that their tree doesn't tip over and that their rooms are more impressive than all of their friends' rooms at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Building takes place over three weeks/rounds, and in each round, players use card drafting and spatial reasoning to add five new rooms to their treehouse. Players must pay attention to the other treehouses being built since they take turns determining which types of rooms score for everyone at the end of each round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the third week, the winner is the player with the best treehouse ever!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: Game is NIS, Kickstarter edition. Includes promo cards from the Kickstarter. Shipping will be $5.50 anywhere in the US.
KS edition with all stretch goals and promo cards from the KS campaign. New copy, still in shrink. I paid $19 for my copy. FREE shipping via USPS Priority Flat Envelope.
New in Shrink with all Kickstarter exclusive bonuses Postage = £3 in the UK Combined postage for multiple orders.
Shipping can go USPS First Class and will be just over $4.00 but less than $5.00 depending on your zip code. Ask for quote. Thank you for taking time to view our listing. Any questions just ask.
Shipping can go USPS First Class and will be just over $4.00 but less than $5.00 depending on your zip code. Ask for quote. Thank you for taking time to view our listing. Any questions just ask.

Green Couch Games (GCG002) Who hasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t dreamed of building the best treehouse in the world? Now it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s time to live that dream! In Best Treehouse Ever, players compete to build their best tree house, outfitting their tree house with cool rooms, while also making sure that their tree doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t tip over and that their rooms are more impressive than all of their friends_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; rooms at the end of the game. Building takes place over three weeks/rounds, and in each round, players use card drafting and spatial reasoning to add five new rooms to their tree house. Players must pay attention to the other tree houses being built since they take turns determining which types of rooms score for everyone at the end of each round. At the end of the third week, the winner is the player with the best tree house ever!
